tags: None
review: She is very humble and very nice, experienced. She is very good. Very nicely she listened to my problem and very clearly sorted out my problem, she described the problem very well and also explained. When I was in operation the other doctors who were there were also very good and the staff also very good in the hospital. Overall my Wockhardt Hospitals experience was very good. I have suggested that other people visit to the doctor. Dr. Mangala Patil and Dr. Jinendra jain and Physicians are very good and the hospital also. Both the doctor listens to you in detail, not like listening to 5 minutes and sending the patient out with patients they listened and explained what the problem is and gives the solution. They treat us like family.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very good experience she treats me like her family member. *** **** ******. Thank u dr mangala patil .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** *** **** ************** *** her instructions were not clear.sshe doesn’t listen completely to patients problems. She kept calling me **** **** **** *** ********  * having me remove multiple sonography ** **** *** ***** ******* ****** Also the thyroid doctor dr. Jinendra Jain kept calling me and asked me to continue coming to him whole pregnancy **** **** ** ******* *** ******** *** **** ********* ** have me admitted in the hospital for my HG issue *** **** **** **** ************* ******* all this I crossed checked once I changed my doctor and hospital...... Very terrible experience. Totally disappointed. And will certainly never recomend her to any one

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would like to bring to your notice that the my ultrasound report done on 4th Sep *** * **** ************* ********** ****** ***** ** ********** ****** I am having DADC fetuses.This report was done under Dr. Mangla Patil.These ignorance is highly not acceptableFor this report I have to pay the highest amount of money of Rs 4800 which is too much on the higher side.Hoping these mistakes are avoidable as the critical informations does matter to some of the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Nice doctor. Very polite and calm. Explained well. Need to do some tests. After that reports only, she can diagnose

tags: None
review: She was very helpful and assisted us properly and also gave proper suggestions. If someone needs I will surely refer the doctor to them. Doctor was good but the services of the hospital was not proper the receptionist were not ready to answer our queries they were in hurry, they need to be able to give mental support why we go to private hospital only for the good service if not we would have been gone to government hospital. We need good facilities and good services so only, I would suggest improving this. Doctor was good. I didn’t have any problem. Our family members also visited him and one of our friends suggested that we visit the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor decided on a C-section without an explanation. She was in a huge rush to get it done and despite pleading for a trial of labour, she went about the delivery her own way.The entire experience was extremely traumatic. To add to that, I suffered from a burn after the surgery a** **** **** ***** ** **** ************* ***** * **** *** **** ** ****** **** ********* Unfortunately I didn't think to take a second opinion and that will always be a regret.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We were not able to consummate. 
As per Dr a surgery was needed wherein tissue would be removed from hymen and there were few more tests she told us to do including sonography, MRI and Blood test.
******* **** ** ******* *** ****** ****** *** ********* *** ********* ****** * **** *** **** ******* *** ************ *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
A big thanks to  Dr Mangala Patil and all Nursing staff, housekeeping staff, Dietitians.Your patient listening, dedication & commitment while delivering care means a lot. I selut Dr Mangala patil for her dedicatin.
Empathy in your each and every act while on patient side is probably the pillar behind Wockhardt.
Also entire team of Wockhardt-  Mr Madhvan shahib  and directly or indirectly involved in care delivery.
Keep up the good work. Namrata agarwal

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Bad  experience with her doc is busy with herself **** *** ***** **** * ****** *************on first visit she even bother what was thr and examine just wrote some test and ask wil check after report..in 2 visit she forgot that we have done report in 1 visit..don't statisfied with her ..my view don't go for this

She was totally good with the patient .

The doctor gave us time for the consultation, for confirmation and everything.I am absolutely satisfied with the doctor's consultation. *** ** * ****** **** *** ********* *******I will definitely recommend the doctor to my friends and family,
